00047   "\n" \
00048   "usage: rsclient [OPTIONS] <host>[:<port>]\n" \

00055   void build_inet_address(struct sockaddr_in &addr, PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, std::string &location) {
00056     std::string host;
00057     uint16_t port;
00058     size_t colon_offset;
00059 
00060     if ((colon_offset = location.find(":")) == string::npos) {
00061       host = location;
00062       port = (uint16_t)props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.RangeServer.Port", 38060);
00063     }
00064     else {
00065       host = location.substr(0, colon_offset);
00066       port = atoi(location.substr(colon_offset+1).c_str());
00067     }
00068       
00069     memset(&addr, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00070     {
00071       struct hostent *he = gethostbyname(host.c_str());
00072       if (he == 0) {
00073         herror(host.c_str());
00074         exit(1);
00075       }
00076       memcpy(&addr.sin_addr.s_addr, he->h_addr_list[0], sizeof(uint32_t));
00077     }
00078     addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00079     addr.sin_port = htons(port);
00080   }
00081 
00082   class NullDispatchHandler : public DispatchHandler {
00083   public:
00084     virtual void handle(EventPtr &eventPtr) { return; }
00085   };
00086 
00087 }

00089 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00090   CommandShellPtr command_shell_ptr;
00091   CommandInterpreterPtr interp_ptr;
00092   string configFile = "";
00093   Comm *comm = 0;
00094   int error = 1;
00095   Hyperspace::SessionPtr hyperspace_ptr;
00096   RangeServerClientPtr range_server_ptr;
00097   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00098   DispatchHandlerPtr null_handler_ptr = new NullDispatchHandler();
00099   PropertiesPtr props_ptr;
00100   std::string location_str;
00101 
00102   System::initialize(argv[0]);
00103   ReactorFactory::initialize((uint16_t)System::get_processor_count());
00104 
00105   try {
00106 
00107     po::options_description generic(usage_str);
00108     generic.add_options()
00109       ("help", "Display this help message")
00110       ;
00111 
00112     CommandShell::add_options(generic);
00113 
00114     // Hidden options: server location
00115     po::options_description hidden("Hidden options");
00116     hidden.add_options()
00117       ("server-location", po::value<string>(), "server location")
00118       ;
00119 
00120     po::options_description cmdline_options;
00121     cmdline_options.add(generic).add(hidden);
00122 
00123     po::positional_options_description p;
00124     p.add("server-location", -1);
00125 
00126     po::variables_map vm;
00127     store(po::command_line_parser(argc, argv).
00128           options(cmdline_options).positional(p).run(), vm);
00129     po::notify(vm);
00130 
00131     if (vm.count("help") || vm.count("server-location") == 0) {
00132       cout << generic << "\n";
00133       return 1;
00134     }
00135 
00136     if (vm.count("config"))
00137       configFile = vm["config"].as<string>();
00138     else
00139       configFile = System::installDir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00140 
00141     props_ptr = new Properties(configFile);
00142 
00143     location_str = vm["server-location"].as<string>();
00144 
00145     build_inet_address(addr, props_ptr, location_str);
00146 
00147     comm = new Comm();
00148 
00149     // Create Range Server client object
00150     range_server_ptr = new RangeServerClient(comm, 30);
00151 
00152     // connect to RangeServer
00153     if ((error = comm->connect(addr, null_handler_ptr)) != Error::OK) {
00154       cerr << "error: unable to connect to RangeServer at " << endl;
00155       exit(1);
00156     }
00157 
00158     // Connect to Hyperspace
00159     hyperspace_ptr = new Hyperspace::Session(comm, props_ptr, 0);
00160     if (!hyperspace_ptr->wait_for_connection(30))
00161       exit(1);
00162 
00163     interp_ptr = new RangeServerCommandInterpreter(comm, hyperspace_ptr, addr, range_server_ptr);
00164 
00165     command_shell_ptr = new CommandShell("rsclient", interp_ptr, vm);
00166     
00167     error = command_shell_ptr->run();
00168 
00169   }
00170   catch(exception& e) {
00171     cerr << "error: " << e.what() << "\n";
00172   }
00173   catch(...) {
00174     cerr << "Exception of unknown type!\n";
00175   }
00176 
00177   return error;
00178 }
